  • StatefulElement

Interface StatefulElement<T>

The StatefulElement interface is ideally implemented by a component whose state is managed by a Lit controller. It declares an offerState() method that can be used to update the component's state from the controller.

Type Parameters

  • T

    The type of the managed state, assumed to be an object type

Hierarchy

  • ReactiveElement
    • StatefulElement

Implemented by

  • ModalPortal

    Consumes state, performing render updates and other actions as necessary.
